content: the mesa sunset bandana cowl is a free crochet pattern on the blog this bandana style cowl is worked in one piece from the bottom up in the beginner friendly linen moss/granite/woven crochet stitch - you only need to know how to single_crochet and chain throw on and go bandana style - perfect easy fall fashion approximate finished size 16 to front tip x 14 wide made with self-striping yarn for ease of color work but would look great in a single color too works up quickly with just one skein of yarn which makes this cowl perfect for gifts complete video tutorial coming soon link to purchase ad-free pdf for a small fee https //nanascraftyhome com/product/mesa-sunset-crochet-cowl-pattern-ad-free-pdf/
